text:
Using org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.RegularExpression I get a 
NullPointerException for an invalid regular expression (such as *). This is 
because RegexParser() doesn't initialize the resource bundle.

Also both the jar file and the source distribution omit the 
message_*.properties files that are in the CVS repository.

If you add the properties file and uncomment the call to setLocale in 
RegexParser:

    public RegexParser() {
        this.setLocale(Locale.getDefault());
    }

everything appears to work fine.

Checked in fix in CVS. Jar file for next release will include 
message_*.properties files.
